column3: The appart was good snd spacious
column4: They toke the money twice from my account and i had to call many times for them to fix it

column3: Room, equipment and neighbourhood with the goodies you may require to buy for an upkeep. Didn't need transportation to visit work places. Just walked in and out.
column4: Self Check-in quite challenging. No one physically present at the property to help at that time. Had to struggle on telephone outside in an unfriendly weather condition. Imagine if l didn't get the check-in directions by mail or lost them or had no credit to call immergency.
Too much parfum in hall and on steps, second floor in door scratch of floor and make noise,

column3: Good and comfortable location, comfortable room.
column4: The furniture is little bit too old and the cleanlenessis doubtable, but all in all it is ok.

column3: I called the service Manager cause of a little problem and sent someone to sort out the door in between 2 rooms within 5 mn on a bank holiday, thank a lot to sort it out s fast
Separate bedroom appreciated. Very spacious apartment for 2.
column4: Furnishings a little dated. Especially carpet which has 2 iron burns and many cigarette ones.

column3: Nice apartment at a convenient location next to Schuman. Spacious place with a kitchenette. Very practical for longer stays. Friendly staff.
column4: The bed is not comfortable and so are the pillows. It's an important minus to an overall positive impression.
